display_long_description:
# Trace Any Image, Anywhere.

Stencil VR lets you transform ANY image into a scalable stencil you can project onto any physical surface. Just upload your image, place it on your surface, scale it up or down to your desired size, and start tracing!

# Key Features:
- **Use Any Image:** Upload any image you'd like to stencilvr.com and it will automatically sync to the app on your headset. Or skip the upload and load an image directly from the headsets local storage.
- **Easily Place On Any Surface:** Stencil VR supports multiple different simple placement methods to ensure your stencil can be perfectly aligned with any surface.
[media]
- **Scale to Fit Any Project:** Easily resize your stencil to fit any project. Stencil VR has been used by artists for everything from skyscraper sized murals to tiny detailed designs.
[media]
- **Match Any Surface Angle:** Working on a slanted surface? No problem! Easily rotate your stencil to perfectly align with any angle.
[media]
- **Adjustable Opacity:** Fine-tune your stencil's visibility to make tracing easy.
[media]
- **Outline Mode:** Instantly convert any image into a traceable outline.
[media]
- **Works Offline:** Need to trace without an internet connection? Stencil VR saves your images locally so you can trace anytime and anywhere.
- **Never Lose Your Progress** Stencil VR automatically saves the position and scale of your stencil so you can re-load it exactly where you left it, even after closing the app.

# Download Stencil VR today and bring your vision into reality!
